short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inverts videos and images. Suitable for learning materials that contain text that cannot be converted by other extensions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension inverts the colors of videos and images to achieve dark mode.
It is most suitable for videos or images that contain black text on white backgrounds that cannot be inverted by other extensions.
It works perfectly while watching courses.
